member.name: T:GuessingGameV1.Range
member.summary: Range will create a valid upper and lower bound. Valid means that the upper bound must be larger than the lower bound.

member.name: P:GuessingGameV1.Range.LBound
member.summary: Lower bound for the range.

member.name: P:GuessingGameV1.Range.UBound
member.summary: Upper bound for the range.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.Range.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor that will either use a valid lower and upper bound, or use default values if the given values are invalid.

member.name: T:GuessingGameV1.GameLogic
member.summary: Contains the logic for a game where one must guess a random number between a given range.

member.name: F:GuessingGameV1.GameLogic.rNum
member.summary: Random number to be guessed.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.GameLogic.#ctor(GuessingGameV1.Range)
member.summary: Constructor that generates a random number.
member.param: Range object used to get upper and lower bounds for random number.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.GameLogic.VerifyGuess(System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes uNum and compares it with rNum.
member.param: The number to compare to the randomly generated number.
member.returns: GameState object that gives a hint of the relationship between rNum and uNum.

member.name: T:GuessingGameV1.GameState
member.summary: Hints for whether a guess is correct or not.

member.name: F:GuessingGameV1.GameState.GUESS_CORRECT
member.summary: Guess is exactly correct.

member.name: F:GuessingGameV1.GameState.TOO_LOW
member.summary: Guess is too low.

member.name: F:GuessingGameV1.GameState.TOO_HIGH
member.summary: Guess is too high.

member.name: T:GuessingGameV1.GuessForm
member.summary: Partial class that holds the view for the guess form. Contains inputs for upper and lower bound of range and allows user to guess random number.

member.name: F:GuessingGameV1.GuessForm.gameLogic
member.summary: Generates a random number in a range that the user will try to guess.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.GuessForm.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor that will initialize the form to play the guessing game.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.GuessForm.BtnStart_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user clicks the start button, the user's upper and lower bounds are used to generate a random number. The form elements to guess the random number are then enabled.

member.name: M:GuessingGameV1.GuessForm.BtnGuess_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user clicks the guess button, the user's guess is taken from the text box and compared with the random number that was generated by gameLogic. The user is either correct and the game ends, or incorrect and they can continue entering guesses.
